text: O vy shcho vvazhayete, yakshcho vy odruzheni viryachi zhinkam, todi divorced yim pered mayuchym spilkuvannyam z nymy, vony ne budutʹ u borhu pered vamy budʹ-yakymy chekayuchymy tymchasovoho (pered tym yak odruzhuvatysya z inshoyu lyudynoyu). Vy budete kompensuvaty yim equitably, ta budete dozvolyty yim idete amicably
